name: Proprietorship Registration
description: Register your business as a sole proprietorship with ease. Ideal for individual entrepreneurs.

name: Partnership Firm Registration
description: Form a partnership firm and get it registered for legal recognition and tax benefits.

name: One Person Company (OPC)
description: Perfect for solo founders wanting limited liability and corporate status.

name: LLP Registration
description: Limited Liability Partnership is ideal for professionals and SMEs.

name: Private Limited Company Registration
description: A flexible and scalable structure for startups and growing companies.

name: Section 8 Company
description: Non-profit organization registration for promoting charity, education, and more.

name: Trust Registration
description: Get your charitable trust registered under Indian Trusts Act.

name: Public Limited Company
description: Register as a public limited company to raise capital from the public.

name: Producer Company
description: Ideal for farmers and agricultural businesses to form a company.

name: Indian Subsidiary Registration
description: Register a foreign company's subsidiary in India for expanding business.

name: GST Registration
description: Register your business under Goods & Services Tax (GST) law quickly and easily.

name: Import Export Code (IEC)
description: Mandatory for businesses involved in import/export from India.

name: Trademark Registration
description: Protect your brand name, logo, or slogan from infringement.
